1.text: Take the Pop Tart out of the foil package.

2.text: Set your toaster to the lowest setting.

3.text: Toast your Pop Tart for about 1 minute.

4.text: Wait for 30 seconds to let the Pop Tart cool down.

5.text: Grab your Pop Tart with your fingers and put it on a plate.

6.text: Unwrap the Pop Tart and take it out of the foil package.

7.text: Put the Pop Tart on a microwave-safe plate.

8.text: Microwave your Pop Tart for 3 seconds.

9.text: Wait for about 10 seconds before picking up your Pop Tart.

10.text: Take the Pop Tarts out of the foil package.

11.text: Place your Pop Tarts on the middle rack of the toaster oven.

12.text: Set the timer for 1 to 3 minutes.

13.text: Use a pair of tongs to grab your Pop Tart.
